response.original_title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Big Movie Comes to a Small Town
response.overview: We find remarks from cast and crew on the perspective which makes this film something unusual, as it offers an intriguing examination of the way a big film production can take over a small area. Though it occasionally feels like a tourism promotion, it's an interesting little show. The piece begins with a series of local residents describing the beautiful town they call home, enthusiastically recounting all of its natural beauties. Filming in the small Slovenian town of Bovec, this feature offers a fascinating look at what happens when a major Hollywood production arrives in a sleepy European town. The piece looks at the construction of a bridge, the creation of a base camp, movie set versus mother nature, the town's history, and more.
response.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: Big Movie Comes to a Small Town
